author: matz-e
body:
Follow up to #15467. With this, the TP implementation should agree with the HTR spec and clarifications from @jmmans.
### LUT
- Defined magic numbers (mainly bitmasks) in the compression LUTs, compress 2017 TPs properly
- Resize compression LUTs once, not at every DetId
- Add two MSB for fine-grain usage to the linearization LUTs
- Fix linearizations LUTs
### Geometry
- Map TP tower at ieta 26, depth 7 to tower 27
### TP Algo
- Add 2016 HF FG fixes from 80X
- Add a stubb algorithm for 2017 HE FG
- Add proper saturation behavior to HF (according to HTR spec)
- Proper accounting of overlap tower at ieta 16
- Split 2017 HE TP algorithm from 2009 HE TP algo to handle fine-grain
title: Improved 2017 HCAL Trigger Primitives
